metadata.title: CVE-2021-46143 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In doProlog in xmlparse.c in Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.3, an integeroverflow exists for m_groupSize.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46143` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.5+esm2
lib64expat1 - 2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.5+esm2
libexpat1 - 2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.5+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libxmltok1 - 1.2-3ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: expat package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.5+esm2').
xmlrpc-c package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
